cause.description:
We want to do all that we can to help children in need all over the world by providing them with daily necessities and sharing with them the love of God. See http://www.hfministry.com/childsponsorship
1. Jesus has called us to help others
2. We can change the world one child at a time.
3. We will do all these through the strength of Christ.
cause.mission: strive to eliminate poverty one child at a time
